#include <iostream>
#include<map>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int d,count2,y=1,count,m=0,i,n,t;
    char q;
    map<string,char> k;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    	count2=0;
    	count=0;
    	cin>>n;
    	string s[n],c[n];
    	for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
    	{
    		cin>>s[j];
    		cin>>q;
    		k[s[j]]=q;
    	}
    	for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
    	{
    	  for(d=0;d<count;d++)
    	  {
    	  	if(s[j]==c[d])
    	  	 break;
    	  }
    	  if(d==count)
    	  {
    	  	c[count]=s[j];
    	  	count++;
    	  }
    	}
    	for(int i=0;i<count;i++)
    	{
    		if(k[c[i]]=='-')
    		 count2--;
    		else
    		 count2++;
    	}
    	cout<<count2<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
